title: The Headache Cure
description: Two top neurologists show the millions of chronic headache sufferers how to identify their type of headache and unlock the key to finding safe, soothing relief Every year, countless people with chronic headaches are misdiagnosed. Often they receive medications that exacerbate their problem, or they overuse overthe- counter painkillers, risking serious damage to the liver and kidneys. The Headache Cure shows sufferers how to identify the real cause of headache pain through self-evaluations, develop an effective treatment plan to deal with acute headaches, and control the triggers that will limit their number and severity.
author: Joseph Kandel
